Uses of Package
edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train

  • Packages that use edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.preproc
    Preprocessing & text normalization routines.
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train
    Training routines for base generative models (e.g., phrase tables, lexical reordering models).
  • Classes in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train used by edu.stanford.nlp.mt.preproc 
    Class and Description
    SymmetricalWordAlignment
    Sentence pair with symmetrical word alignment (i.e., if e_i aligns to f_j in one direction, then f_j aligns to e_i as well in the other direction).
  • Classes in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train used by edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train 
    Class and Description
    AbstractFeatureExtractor
    Feature extractor offering default implementations for members of FeatureExtractor.
    AbstractPhraseExtractor
    The preferred way of instanciating PhraseExtractor is to extend AbstractPhraseExtractor.
    AbstractSourceFilter 
    AbstractWordAlignment
    Abstract class representing a set of word alignments for one sentence pair.
    AlGridCell
    Information associated with each cell of an AlignmentGrid.
    AlignmentGrid
    A representation of an AlignmentTemplate collection as a matrix.
    AlignmentGrid.RelativePos 
    AlignmentTemplate
    An alignment template: a source-language phrase (f), a target-language phrase (c), and word alignment.
    AlignmentTemplateInstance
    An alignment template and its position within a sentence pair.
    AlignmentTemplates
    AlignmentTemplates is a collection that maps between AlignmentTemplate instances and a contiguous non-negative integer index series beginning (inclusively) at 0.
    FeatureExtractor
    Interface for extracting sentence-level and phrase-level features from training data.
    FlatPhraseExtractor
    Implementation of phrase-extract that runs in time O(m * s * t), where m is the maximum phrase length, and s and t are respectively the lengths of the source and target sentence.
    GIZAWordAlignment
    Sentence pair with GIZA word alignment, with GIZA alignment probability for each direction.
    MosesPharoahFeatureExtractor
    Extractor for the five base feature functions of Moses/Pharaoh (four translation probabilities plus phrase penalty).
    PhraseExtract
    Combines multiple phrase-level feature extractors into one, and prints their outputs to STDOUT.
    PhraseExtractor
    Interface for phrase extraction (or, more specifically, extraction of AlignmentTemplateInstance objects).
    PhrasePrinter 
    SourceFilter
    Filter for phrase extraction: a given phrase pair (F,E) is extracted and weighed only if F is listed is accepted by the filter.
    SparseVectorFeatureExtractor
    Class that associates one sparse vector to each alignment template.
    StatisticsCollector
    Interface for collecting global statistics from training data.
    SymmetricalWordAlignment
    Sentence pair with symmetrical word alignment (i.e., if e_i aligns to f_j in one direction, then f_j aligns to e_i as well in the other direction).
    WordAligner
    An interface for getting out word alignment information from a WordAlignment and other possible information, such as IBMModel1, etc.
    WordAlignment
    Interface to word alignments for one sentence pair.
